# TOWN COUNCIL

# **Council Meetings are held every 2nd and 4th Wednesday, 6:00pm, at the Town Hall. (unless otherwise posted)**

**Council Members:** 

### **Position No. 1** - *Kevin Black*

### **Position No. 2 - Merv Schmidt**

### **Position No. 3 - John Adkins**

### **Position No. 4 - Larry Hall**

### **Position No. 5 - Keith St. Jeor**

Coulee Dam Town Hall, 300 Lincoln Avenue, Coulee Dam, WA 99116   (509) 633-0320
